data.title: Utah Jazz New Employee App
data.meta_description: Our team designed and developed the Utah Jazz Ensemble app for employees of the Utah Jazz professional basketball team. The app provides easy access to work-related information, tools, and services, ensuring a seamless user experience with intuitive interfaces and interactive features. Through collaborative efforts, we delivered a successful launch within months, supported by a marketing strategy that included digital and print collateral to promote app adoption.
data.text:
Project Description

Utah Jazz, a professional basketball team in the NBA, needed a new employee mobile app, Utah Jazz Ensemble, to provide easy access to information, tools, and services to support their work and wellbeing. Our creative and developer team designed and developed the app with a seamless user experience, including user-friendly navigation, intuitive interfaces, and interactive features. My marketing strategy included digital and print collateral such as emails, app store design, app icon design, flyers, cards, and posters to encourage adoption.

â

After several design sprints, user testing, and collaborative work with the Utah Jazz team, I delivered a complete set of wireframes, visual designs, and an app experience for Utah Jazz Ensemble. The app was successfully launched within months, providing employees with the tools and information needed to stay competitive and maintain their wellbeing.
